column5: Heading to Shekak Lake with White River Air at the end of July. Looking for any info on the lake ( marked maps, fish size ) Can't find much out there on the internet. I firgured I would ask on here before I contact Dan at WRA. Thanks

This must be your lucky day as this was just posted on another site. With more to come, looks like your going to a great camp and big lake. http://www.canadafishingguide.net/fo...ver-air/#p2328 You can find lots of info on other lakes on that site as well. Best of luck on your trip.
